data.oai_dc:dc: Mehrabi et al. The importance of microhabitat for biodiversity sampling dataset

Data set for the publication associated with this Dryad data package, on the effects of microhabitat on biodiversity metrics, using dung beetles as a focal taxon. This data set contains a species by site matrix, trap based environmental variables, and species dry biomass estimates. The data set xls. file was created using Microsoft Excel 2011. See README for more details and metadata.
